content:
I've discussed with @Grahame Grieve and have scheduled an IPS and IPA session at 6:00 PM UTC today. The idea (as I have it now) is:

This is for discussion of the current state of the IPS and IPA projects/specifications and exploring how the projects can leverage each other and work together and/or combine these two efforts.

It's not in Whova yet, but it should be shortly.
